mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, PASSWORD, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, TOKEN, GENDER, LAST_IP, ROLE
mapper.insert: insert into USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, PASSWORD, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, TOKEN, GENDER, LAST_IP, ROLE) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_IP = #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
